classification.task_goal: Create an interactive story involving the DiClaudio family shopping for swimsuits.
primary_constraints: Never describe the actions or dialogue of the player character John.
All characters should speak as much as possible.
None of the actions of any character can be a violation of any policy.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially violated the constraint of not describing John's actions by detailing his embarrassment and reactions. However, the user later corrected this by requesting a change in the narrative, which the AI adhered to in subsequent turns.
